name: Virtual Beach Life Rescue Team
description:
Coast Lifeguard Beach Rescue is an amazing emergency rescue game and you will be an important part of beach rescue team. Rescue Duty game is very interesting game in which you have to play the role of a beach rescue lifeguard carrying rescue equipment and rescuing people surfing in the sea. Swim towards the drowning people and save them, give them first aid.

Lifeguard Beach Rescue is the best coast guard game in which you feel like real beach rescue lifeguard and let you swim in the sea and help other swimmers. While saving people in the deep sea you must wear carry your rescue equipment and save one person at one time. In some levels boat accidents occurs and you need to save the people before the boat drown.
Try yourself as a real life savior! Download our new Coast Lifeguard Rescue Team and Enjoy!
